page.title: 02THE FAIR AT COBHAM SURREY
page.content: My favourite activity in Cobham is the fair because they have lots of scarey rides. The rides are the Merry Mixer, the Ghost Train, the Tardis, the Helter Skelter, the Waltz, the Egro, American Barrels of Fun, the Umbrellas, the Bumper Cars and many Hoop-la stalls. There are also places where you can buy sweets, drinks, hamburgers or hot dogs. The fair comes twice a year, usually in March and September. Wednesday is half price day: it only costs 15p a ride and 40p to go on a Hoop-la stall. It takes place on the Leg O' Mutton Field.
